t: Mokobara: Premium quality travel gear at affordable prices - About Amazon India
s: November 15, 2024 - The three-year old lifestyle brand expects a four-fold increase in sales during the ongoing Great Indian Festival 2023, says CEO Sangeet Agrawal. Sangeet Agrawal, the founder of Mokobara, was inspired to launch a luggage brand after a frustrating travel experience a few years ago.
CABIN LUGGAGE THAT'S ROOMY, SHARP AND MADE FOR MODERN TRAVEL

t: Amazon.com: MOKOBARA Women's The Work Tote Green Vegan Leather Water Resistant Laptop (14" Laptop Compartment) Cross Body Bag Messenger Bag For Work Business - 10L 2022 - Model Large Eye Contact : Electronics
s: I have purchased the product on 16th Oct and within 15 days of use the strap came off. I have used two products from Mokobara before which have given great results. But, seems like many other one time success brands, Mokobara also has started to ignore the quality aspects.
